title: SC strikes down Vanashakti judgment
content: The Supreme Court struck down a judgment related to the Vanashakti case, indicating a significant ruling.
This ruling is likely to have implications for environmental regulations or legal precedents.
Further details about the case and the specific implications of the ruling are needed.

title: ExplainSpeaking: How Trump’s tariffs have run into an affordability crisis
content: The article discusses how Trump's tariffs have led to an affordability crisis.
It analyzes the economic impact and consequences of these tariffs.
The analysis will cover the effects on various sectors and consumers.
Key aspects include increased prices and decreased affordability.

title: Gen-Z protests erupt in Nepal again, curfew imposed
content: Protests by Gen-Z are occurring in Nepal.
A curfew has been imposed in response to the protests.
The reasons for the protests and the government's response are of interest.
